===Etymology===
From [[北海]] ([[ほっかい]], [[Hokkai]], "the North Sea") which comes from [[北]] ("north") and [[海]] ("sea") + [[道]] ([[どう]], [[dō]], "a Circuit"). Literally meaning "the North Sea Circuit".
